## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Transfer System at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (42.5, -80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

### Iron Ore Processing System at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -45.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities into occupied tiles
- Ensure you can place an entity in a tile before attempting placement. Consider increasing spacing, changing direction, or adjusting the reference position if an entity already occupies the target position.

### Errors due to missing items in inventory
- Verify that you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to place entities. Ensure that burner-inserters or other required items are available in your inventory to avoid placement errors.

### Inserters waiting for source items
- Ensure that the source items are available for inserters to function correctly. Check the supply chain and ensure that materials are being delivered to the inserters' source positions.
